website_summaries.verdict: The second version of the SpeedForm Slingshot is a lightweight running shoe packed with top-notch Under Armour technologies. It gained positive reviews from various users and had continued to wow runners with its functionality, design, and comfort. On the other hand, there were complaints about the upper unit, with some considering the fabrics to be irritating and one treating the fit system to be unreliable.
pros: A significant number of users mentioned that the Under Armour SpeedForm Slingshot 2 is very comfortable
Some purchasers admired the lightweight design of the SlingShot 2
The shoe fits well and requires no break-in time, said some wearers
A few others happily expressed that they have been using the shoe not just for running, but also for walking and gym workout sessions
Several users said that the mesh upper was sufficiently breathable
According to some runners, the SpeedForm Slingshot 2 has a good-looking design
One user is delighted with the shoe’s wide toe box
Several testers thought that the laces of the shoe are odd, but it provides better fit and support
cons: The material used for the upper unit was considered by a few people to be rough and abrasive
A consumer lamented the flimsy lateral support given by the knit upper and the asymmetrical lacing system

customer_reviews.title: Casual chilling shoes
customer_reviews.text: I wanted the slip on fabric type shoe for casual walking, option to go sockless freedom. These fit the bill. Most brands I'm an 8.5 but for Reebok and Nike I had to go 9 because they usually run narrow. I've never tried on UA before so no idea how their sizing skewed. Luckily, 8.5 is fine. This kind of shoe, wanted a snug fit, wearing a sock feeling. I would not run in there or play sports. I don't think it gives you the confidence you need for quick lateral movements or heavy pounding on pavement. Strictly relaxing shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Skynet131

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the last version
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as the last version of this shoe. The tongue is attached on the other side compared to the last version. I was very excited to get this shoe but just as disappointed when I put it on. It’s difficult to adjust the tongue properly. Why did UA change a great shoe? Change for the sake of change is no good.
customer_reviews.author: heymarcel

customer_reviews.title: Grip failure
customer_reviews.text: The shoes has good design, comfortable wearing, fits very well. The grip is not so good, the brand new shoes started slipping on wet floors at my work place. It’s risky to wear these shoes when it’s snowing or raining outside. When I started working out at gym my feet started paining after 5 mins running, it’s terrible. If I do the same workout with other shoes like Nike, my feet doesn’t hurt. I totally am disappointed with the performance of these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Uday K.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for running and gym work
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes so much that I bought a second pair after wearing the first pair for just one day!! They fit great. I love the burrito wrap tongue, the offset lacing and stretching breathable material. It's like they are hugging my feet. They are very light weight while giving support. The spring give each step a nice charged push. I was immediately able to increase my speed on the treadmill. My new favorite exercise shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen C

customer_reviews.title: Great casual tennis shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes but they run about a size too large. They don’t have enough padded bounce to use them for running but great for everyday sporty shoe. Love the stretchy fabric, very comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Richmond

customer_reviews.title: Caution
customer_reviews.text: Great fitting shoe. Do not wear if it will come in contact with water, it will become slick as glass. I am not talking a little, but like ice skates on ice. Maybe a safety issue.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoes for every day use!
customer_reviews.text: Got these shoes for my boyfriend and he loves them! He does some cardio and a decent amount of weightlifting and they're stretchy and very comfortable on his feet.
customer_reviews.author: LoneWanderer01

customer_reviews.title: Narrow shoe
customer_reviews.text: Nice work out shoe for all activities. If u have wide feet stay away.
customer_reviews.author: Legit

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: THey are the most confortable, light sport shoes you can get. I would buy them in every colour
customer_reviews.author: Cristian Bruno

customer_reviews.title: Poor material
customer_reviews.text: Don’t rub in this shoe it will rip if you make a quick stop
customer_reviews.author: Andre Tillman

customer_reviews.title: Super light and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I wear this shoes for my mornings runs. Very light and comfortable. I also like working out in it. Only thing I don’t like very much is how the tounge is designed to move freely, however some people may like it to be this way
customer_reviews.author: Hamad

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gym shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Very light. Perfect for working out. They are very flexible. Lightest shoe that I own. The shoe tie is a bit weird as it is hard to tie your you to tighten the fit.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Ortega

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a fan of the cloth upper.. it makes it so you dont need to ever untie them they stretch around ur feet and are still snug.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Joseph Shindelar

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Very lightweight. Walked the Vegas trip with these bad boys with no issues. Got my self a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: Humberto C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes for running, when I wear it, I don’t feel uncomfortable. It fits well. Use mainly for running and gym.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy lightweight shoe
customer_reviews.text: Good sturdy lightweight shoe. I use them as my every day shoe as well for running and weight lifting. Once you get a light weight shoe it's hard to go back to anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I love theses shoes!! Almost like running bare foot, they make me wanna run faster,
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Very light shoe
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is very light shoe. I dont hate it but I dont like it at the same time. Just not my style
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Light Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Super light and awesome for races. I always get a lot of compliments on the all red design.
customer_reviews.author: John Thorpe

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality
customer_reviews.text: The side tie is very unique while the shoe is comfortable it is not a good running shoe.
customer_reviews.author: hl

customer_reviews.title: Terrible shoes
customer_reviews.text: Worst shoes ever, no comfort, no support.! Feet hurt every time I wear them
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Love them. the most comfortable Sneakers for daily
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely Love them . the most comfortable Sneakers for daily use
customer_reviews.author: Evgeny Zateev

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The soles have no give and no bend. Hard as a rock. Very disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Winkle

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and light
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are super light and comfortable, the laces take a little while to get used to as the go all the way to the heel on the last loop
customer_reviews.author: Christopher M

customer_reviews.title: This size 13 shoe is in the Men's Department, and NOT a women's shoe
customer_reviews.text: The laces are a new configuration, but they fit well, fabric top wicks out moisture and the shoe is easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Island Hopper

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight! Cool looks, too.
customer_reviews.text: I can honestly say I have never seen such a light weight sneaker type shoe. It is the most startling feature. The asymetrical stretchy lacing is what you notice next. Then my husband put the shoes on and fell in love- they are incredibly comfortable! And they offer good support- he has littleack pain after walking in them for a good while. Don't yet know how this material will hold up in our desert weather. All around - a cool-looking, supportive and comfortable pair of shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Caraleisa

customer_reviews.title: Odd looking but comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very light-weight and comfortable, they are made of stretch nylon with perforated top toe area that allows them to breath. The asymmetrical lacing is a bit unusual but not that noticeable. The rubber sole area near the toe curves upward and gives them somewhat of an Elf-ish appearance. They are very comfortable and almost feel as though they are hugging your feet.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip O.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable. The wide set lace system is ingenious
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable. The wide set lace system is ingenious. The breathable knit top is great and allows your toes to flex anytime. Great for walking or jogging or just everyday treadmill run. A caveat is the sole is very slippery on wet surface. Looks great too.
customer_reviews.author: Yesuaini99

customer_reviews.title: So far I like the shoes
customer_reviews.text: So far I like the shoes, there ultra light weight and very flexible. The mesh allows your foot to breathe. The sole has good grip, but is kind of stiff, not flexible. The shoes don't have a tongue, they kinda wrap around you foot like a Burrito. Not a major problem just takes some time getting used too. Over all they are good mid range running shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Rowan

customer_reviews.title: Very unique-looking shoe that is comfy.
customer_reviews.text: Another great product from Under Armour. These shoes are about 8 ounces each with breathable mesh, so these are perfect for running, jogging or just good ole walking. Very unique lacing system that I don't think I've seen before. It fits just right in my book, so order the size you regularly would in most cases. They are soft and stretchy, so even if you order 0.5 less your usual size, you should be able to break these in without problems.
customer_reviews.author: Dmitry Kristal

customer_reviews.title: Very cool design, lightweight
customer_reviews.text: These are great, very lightweight shoes. The top is thin and breathable material. The laces have a very cool design that makes this almost a slip on type shoes, yet with a snug fit. The sole doesn't provide much arch support. My husband ends up adding a Dr Scholls gel sole for additional cushioning.
customer_reviews.author: OnAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Shoes
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these shoes! Besides the fact that they are comfortable and trendy, he loves that the tongue is on the side. People notice the uniqueness and always comment. He thinks the bottom back of the shoe looks like a hoof... he really likes that too! 😂
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Four Sons

customer_reviews.title: Nice trainers
customer_reviews.text: Look is really nice. They fit well. The cushioning isn’t the best but I don’t mind that. I have used primarily for training (jogging). They are also nice for casual attire.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

product_meta.title: Under Armour Men's Speedform Slingshot 2 Running Shoes
feature_bullets: Innovative UA SpeedForm construction molds to the foot for a precision fit, eliminating all distraction
Threadborne knit upper for a breathable, compression-like fit that delivers lightweight directional strength
Sock-like "burrito tongue" construction wraps the foot for a closer fit & better foot guidance
Perforations built into the tongue & toe box for increased breathability
Adjustable wide-set lacing system & external heel counter ensure a lockdown fit
